property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Abyssal Specter deals damage to a player, that player discards a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike {W}: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The soldier's path is worn smooth by the tread of many feet - all in one direction, none returning." - Oracle en-Vec

property.name: Flavor
property.value: These spirits of the air are winsome and wild and cannot be truly contained. Only marginally intelligent, they often substitute whimsy for strategy, delighting in mischief and mayhem.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {T}: Target attacking or blocking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If only every message were as perfect as its bearer.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Arc Lightning deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three targets.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rainclouds don't last long in Shiv, but that doesn't stop the lightning.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sharpen your ears - Elvish expression meaning "grow wiser"

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I always charge a little extra to take on a pegasus. They fly like eagles, kick like mules, and hide like hermits." - Tahlil en-Dal, bounty hunter

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Little dreamt could seem so cruel As waiting for the wings outspread, The jagged teeth, the burning eyes, And dagger-claws that clench to nerves.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {0}: Return Blinking Spirit to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Don't look at it Maybe it'll go away" - Ib Halfheart, goblin tactician

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return Broken Fall to its owner's hand: Regenerate target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I think I used up all my good luck and all my bad luck in the same fall." - Gerrard of the Weatherlight

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Cackling Fiend enters the battlefield, each opponent discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its windpipe is only the first to amplify its maddening laughter.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy all lands or all creatures. Creatures destroyed this way can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Radiant's eyes flashed. "Go, then," the angel spat at Serra, "and leave this world to those who truly care."

property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {B} or {R}. Cinder Marsh doesn't untap during your next untap step.

property.value: Enchant creature You control enchanted creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They are Phyrexia's couriers; the messages they carry are inscribed on their slick hides.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player returns a creature they control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an opponent plays a land, put a +1/+1 counter on Dirtcowl Wurm.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Few of Rath's rivers follow a steady course, so many new channels are carved for them.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I implore you not to forget the horrors of the past. You would have us start the Brothers' War anew" - Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi heretic

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Teferi is a problem student. Always late for class. No appreciation for constructive use of time." - Barrin, progress report

Rules
property.value: Each player puts a creature card from their graveyard onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Death - an outmoded concept. We sleep, and we change." - Sitrik, birth priest

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature dies, that creature's controller may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Life is eternal. A lifetime is ephemeral.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant land Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The forest was too lush for the brothers to despoil - almost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Fire Ants deals 1 damage to each other creature without flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Visitors to Shiv fear the dragons, the goblins, or the viashino. Natives fear the ants.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A dash of cool water does wonders to clear a cluttered battlefield." - Vibekke Ragnild, Witches and War

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They were formidable even before they learned the use of weapons.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Target player gains 3 life. • Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Heat Ray deals X damage to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's not known whether the Thran built the device to forge their wonders or to defend them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hurricane deals X damage to each creature with flying and each player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Target attacking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The true dishonor for a soldier is surviving the war." - Telim'Tor

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, if an opponent controls more lands than you, you may search your library for up to three basic land cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lhurgoyf's power is equal to the number of creature cards in all graveyards and its toughness is equal to that number plus 1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ach Hans, run It's the lhurgoyf" - Saffi Eriksdotter, last words

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A lightning elemental once killed an entire tribe of merfolk - simply by going for a swim.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player exiles all creature cards from their graveyard, then sacrifices all creatures they control, then puts all cards they exiled this way onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One bone broken for every twig snapped underfoot. - Llanowar penalty for trespassing

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Man-o'-War enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Beauty to the eye does not always translate to the touch." - Naimah, Femeref philosopher

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The fatal flaw in every plan is the assumption that you know more than your enemy." - Volrath

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and can't block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only by sacrificing any semblance of defense could Gerrard best Greven.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {U}: Manta Riders gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Water is firmament to the finned." - Oracle en-Vec

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A skilled decoy can throw your enemies off your trail. A master decoy can survive to do it again." - Gerrard of the Weatherlight

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {R} or {G}. Mogg Hollows doesn't untap during your next untap step.

property.value: First strike When Nekrataal enters the battlefield, destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. That creature can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have seen the horrors Kaervek has freed. My Betrayal is certain - but of Kaervek or of Jamuraa, I cannot say." - Jolrael

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "He cocooned himself alone in his workshop for months. When he finally emerged, all broad grins and excited chatter, I knew he'd found his answer." - Barrin, master wizard

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For the first time in his life, Grakk felt a little warm and fuzzy inside.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of the end step, if no creatures are on the battlefield, sacrifice Pestilence. {B}: Pestilence deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice a creature: Phyrexian Ghoul gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Phyrexia wastes nothing. Its food chain is a spiraling cycle.

property.value: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No fair Since when does a bug get ta munch on me?" - Squee, goblin cabin hand

property.value: {2}{G}: Plated Rootwalla gets +3/+3 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: " . . . And the third little boar built his house out of rootwalla plates . . . ." - Skyshroud children's story

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Occasionally members of the Institute of Arcane Study acquire a taste for worldly pleasures. Seldom do they have trouble finding employment.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He raged at the world, at his family, at his life. But mostly he just raged.

property.value: Untap target creature an opponent controls and gain control of it until end of turn. That creature gains haste until end of turn. When you lose control of the creature, tap it.

property.value: "You will learn to earn death." - Volrath

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "But no one heard the snake's gentle hiss for peace over the elephant's trumpeting of war." - Afari, Tales

property.name: Rules
property.value: Rolling Thunder deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of targets.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Such rage," thought Vhati, gazing up at the thunderhead from the Predator. "It is Greven's mind manifest."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Whenever a creature dies, put a +1/+1 counter on enchanted creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "First blood isn't as important as last blood." - Gerrard of the Weatherlight

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Serra told them to guard Urza as he healed. Five years they stood.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice Sanctum Guardian: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to any target this turn, prevent that damage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sandstorm deals 1 damage to each attacking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even the landscape turned against Sarsour, first rising up and pelting him, then rearranging itself so he could no longer find his way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Flourishing during the Ice Age, these wurms were the bane of all Kjeldorans. Their great size and ferocity made them the subject of countless nightmares - they embodied the worst of the Ice Age." - Kjeldor: Ice Civilization

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The only sound was the gentle clicking of the faeries' wings. Then those intruders who were still standing turned and fled. One thing was certain: they didn't think the Scryb were very funny anymore.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Seasoned Marshal attacks, you may tap target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There are only two rules of tactics: never be without a plan, and never rely on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We shun them not for their dream but for their refusal to let such a noble dream die a noble death." - Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Whenever a creature dealt damage by Sengir Vampire this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Sengir Vampire.

property.value: {B}, Pay 1 life: Sewer Rats gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate no more than three times each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You lie down with rats, and the rats run away. - Suq'Ata insult

property.value: Shower of Sparks deals 1 damage to target creature and 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The viashino had learned how to operate the rig through trial and error - mostly error.

property.value: Skyshroud Elite gets +1/+2 as long as an opponent controls a nonbasic land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Civilization is a conspiracy to disguise the mutilation of nature." - Skyshroud elite creed

property.value: "Children of the Ruins, raised to be warriors, know that life begins when another speaks their names." - Soltari Tales of Life

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The true names of birds are songs woven into their souls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Count carefully the souls and see that none are lost. - Vec teaching

property.value: Steam Blast deals 2 damage to each creature and each player.

property.value: The viashino knew of the cracked pipes but deliberately left them unmended to bolster the rig's defenses.

property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent loses 1 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.

property.value: Kerrick's corrupt domain swelled like a blister on Tolaria's skin.

property.value: "And darkness shall be cast from me For my soul resides in the Sun." - Femeref dirge

property.value: Although the elves of Argoth always considered them a nuisance, the pixies made fine allies during the war against the machines.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: These are its last days. But it will not go quietly.

property.value: "If fear is the only tool you have left, then you'll never control me." - Xantcha, to Gix

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Oi oi oi, me gotta hurt in 'ere, Oi oi oi, me smell a ting is near, Gonna bosh 'n gonna nosh 'n da hurt'll disappear." - Troll chant

property.value: At a distance, we mistook the sound for a waterfall . . . .

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The efreet is a striding storm with a voice that crackles like fire." - Qhattib, vizier of Amiqat

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No bird soars too high, if he soars with his own wings." - William Blake, The Marriage of Heaven and Hell

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player discards their hand, then draws cards equal to the greatest number of cards a player discarded this way.

property.value: "To fill your mind with knowledge, we must start by emptying it." - Barrin, master wizard
